{{Infobox_Company | company_name = United Telephone Company of Kansas| company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] ([[Subsidiary]] of [[CenturyLink]])| company_slogan = | foundation = 1909| location = [[Overland Park, Kansas|Overland Park, KS]], [[USA]]| key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | revenue = | parent = [[Sprint Nextel|United/Sprint Nextel]] (until 2006)
[[Embarq]] (2006-2009)
[[CenturyLink]] (2009-present)| products = [[Plain old telephone service|Local Telephone Service]]| subsid = | homepage = http://embarq.centurylink.com/kansas }} '''United Telephone Company of Kansas''' is one of several [[CenturyLink]] companies providing local telephone service in [[Kansas]]. Kansas towns that United Telephone of Kansas serves include [[Junction City, Kansas|Junction City]], [[Burlington, Kansas|Burlington]], [[Hillsboro, Kansas|Hillsboro]], and [[Garnett, Kansas|Garnett]]. The company was founded in [[1909]] as '''The American Telephone Company'''. It was owned by [[Sprint Nextel]] until [[2006]] when it was spun off into [[Embarq]]. CenturyTel acquired Embarq in [[2009]], at which point United Telephone of Kansas began doing business as [[CenturyLink]]. {{CenturyLink}} [[Category:CenturyLink]] [[Category:Sprint Nextel]] [[Category:Companies established in 1909]] [[Category:Communications in Kansas]] [[Category:Telecommunications companies of the United States]]
